title: Jira API Create Component Operation Response Schema
description: Schema representing the output of the create component operation in Jira API

isAssigneeTypeValid.description: Whether a user is associated with assigneeType.

realAssigneeType.description: The type of the assignee that is assigned to issues created with this component, when an assignee cannot be set from the assigneeType.

name.description: The unique name for the component in the project.

project.description: The key of the project the component is assigned to.

realAssignee.description: The user assigned to issues created with this component, when assigneeType does not identify a valid assignee.

48x48.description: The URL of the item's 48x48 pixel avatar.

32x32.description: The URL of the item's 32x32 pixel avatar.2

24x24.description: The URL of the item's 24x24 pixel avatar.

16x16.description: The URL of the item's 16x16 pixel avatar.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

id.description: The unique identifier for the component.

assigneeType.description: The nominal user type used to determine the assignee for issues created with this component.

assignee.description: The details of the user associated with assigneeType,

48x48.description: The URL of the item's 48x48 pixel avatar.

32x32.description: The URL of the item's 32x32 pixel avatar.

24x24.description: The URL of the item's 24x24 pixel avatar.

16x16.description: The URL of the item's 16x16 pixel avatar.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

projectId.description: The ID of the project the component is assigned to.

lead.description: The user details for the component's lead user.

48x48.description: The URL of the item's 48x48 pixel avatar.

32x32.description: The URL of the item's 32x32 pixel avatar.

24x24.description: The URL of the item's 24x24 pixel avatar.

16x16.description: The URL of the item's 16x16 pixel avatar.

displayName.description: The display name of the user

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.

headers.description: HTTP headers of the API response.
